publisher.value: HL7 International - Biomedical Research and Regulation Work Group

description.value: The PCORNet Diagnosis Source contains the codes to be used by PCORNet data marts.

definition.value: Classification of Diagnosis Source is Admitting.
Classification of Diagnosis Source is Discharge.
Classification of Diagnosis Source is Final, Ambulatory encounters would generally be expected to have a source of “Final”.
Classification of Diagnosis Source is Interim, it is not necessary to populate interim diagnoses unless readily available.
Classification of Diagnosis Source has No information.
Classification of Diagnosis Source is Unknown.
Classification of Diagnosis Source is Other.
